events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a Refund request based on the customer's message.
Support agent Anna has been assigned to handle the refund case for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process the refund?
My order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product I received.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the amount back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the prompt handling of my refund request.
The refund process has been completed on our end, and the case is now resolved. Please contact us if you have further questions.
Just checking in to ensure that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory.
I have received the refund today. Thank you very much for your excellent support!
We are closing this case now. Please donâ€™t hesitate to reach out if you need any help in the future.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback about their experience.
